programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: The Odd-Job Men
programme.desc: A week in the life of Moha, Valero and Pep - workers in a small plumbing and electricity company in the outskirts of Barcelona, Spain. Moha is on a one-week trial period and is set to replace Pep, but Valero doesn't think he has what it takes.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: A Perfect Fit
programme.desc: A big city lawyer with impossible standards, Katharina is sure that carpenter Mike is not the one for her. Though Mike does not meet any of her criteria, there seems to be an unexplainable spark between the unlikely couple.

programme.title: Young Tiger
programme.desc: Illegally smuggled into France to work, 15-year-old Many is unexpectedly placed in school and a foster home. Years later, thriving in the French Sikh community, Many faces a moral dilemma arising from his ties to his family in his home country.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: The Package
programme.desc: A man’s journey to deliver a package turns into a life-changing experience.

programme.title: Pari
programme.desc: Pari, an Iranian mother, goes to Athens with her husband to meet their son studying abroad. When their son is nowhere to be seen, she embarks on a journey in the unfamiliar city where she will uncover more than just her son’s whereabouts.

programme.title: Binti (OTO)
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24 - EP 2
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Cube USA S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Dwyane Wade introduces The Cube, 15 square feet of steel-edged plexiglass where simple tasks become challenges teams have nine lives to win seven games to beat The Cube for a chance to walk away with 250,000.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: The toughest Bake Off of them all is back again. Twelve teams from across Britain compete to craft exquisite entremets, delicious desserts and spectacular showpieces. Who will impress world-renowned judges Benoit Blin and Cherish Finden, and be crowned the winner?

programme.title: Shark with Steve Backshall - EP 2
programme.desc: Features naturalist and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall, as he gets us closer to sharks, to encounter a diverse and incredible family of over 400 different types. This global journey will take us to the remotest parts of our planet, from the sun-drenched tropics to the mysterious depths of our oceans.

programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Unnamed Memory Season 1 - The Past Recalled Once Again 無名記憶 (第1季) - EP2
programme.desc: Oscar, crown prince of Falsas, embarks on a quest to lift a childhood curse that prevents him from producing an heir.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: The Odd-Job Men
programme.desc: A week in the life of Moha, Valero and Pep - workers in a small plumbing and electricity company in the outskirts of Barcelona, Spain. Moha is on a one-week trial period and is set to replace Pep, but Valero doesn't think he has what it takes.

programme.title: A Perfect Fit
programme.desc: A big city lawyer with impossible standards, Katharina is sure that carpenter Mike is not the one for her. Though Mike does not meet any of her criteria, there seems to be an unexplainable spark between the unlikely couple.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Pari
programme.desc: Pari, an Iranian mother, goes to Athens with her husband to meet their son studying abroad. When their son is nowhere to be seen, she embarks on a journey in the unfamiliar city where she will uncover more than just her son’s whereabouts.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the Côte Sauvage.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Lake Como, Italy. A cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve. What happened that night? How will this accident change the destiny of the rich Bernaschi family and the Rovelli family on the edge of bankruptcy?

programme.title: Mediterranea (OTO)
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows A Vigilante Justice
programme.desc: When a ransom demand suddenly appears, the disappearance of 19-year-old Tim Jatzkowski is now a cause of concern. While the boy’s father wants the police to rescue him, inspector Martin Brühl tries to convince his family to pay the ransom.
